channel.title: Anything You Want (8/10) :: Linux Reader
channel.description: Quick read about creating the business (and life) that you want. These lessons spill over into other areas of life, maybe accidentally. Life isnâ€™t all about maximizing profits and accelerated growth. Do what makes you happy. Treat your customers like rock stars and they will tell everyone. Summary and Highlights A business plan should never take more than a few hours of work. Hopefully no more than a few minutes. The best plans start simple. A quick glance and common sense should tell you if the numbers will work. The rest are details.
